metadata.synopsis: Toobin stands by the Neurocitor, calling the player's attention.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_foundry_fundangofollower"go to -1981; -6; 206walk into the boss room and defeat the enemieswait for Toobin to walk to his position by the Neurocitorobserve the AD paly

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: It is time - let us end this.
